author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ملاحظه شد که این همج رعاع گمان نموده‌اند که بقتل و غارت و نفی احبّای الهی از بلاد توانند سراج قدرت ربّانی را بیفسرند و شمس صمدانی را از نور بازدار
translation: Behold how in this Dispensation the worthless and foolish have fondly imagined that by such instruments as massacre, plunder and banishment they can extinguish the Lamp which the Hand of Divine power hath lit, or eclipse the Daystar of everlasting splendor. How utterly unaware they seem to be of the truth that such adversity is the oil that feedeth the flame of this Lamp! Such is God’s transforming power. He changeth whatsoever He willeth; He verily hath power over all things.…
